sentences: Praegusel ajal on meil palju v천imalusi.
Ta elab praegusel perioodil 체sna rahulikku elu.
K천ik need muutused on toimunud praegusel aastak체mnel.
context: The word 'praegusel' is an Estonian adessive case form of 'praegu', meaning 'currently' or 'nowadays'. It indicates something happening at the present time. The '-sel' ending shows it's in the adessive case, which often means 'on/at/in' something. So 'praegusel' literally means 'at/on currently' and is used to specify when something is happening - during the current period or time.
